comprehensive_overview: zip is a compression and file packaging utility for Unix, VMS, DOS, OS/2, Windows 9x/NT/XP, Minix, Atari, Macintosh, Amiga, and Acorn RISC OS.
core_features: Zip allows users to compress or package files into a single archive file for easier storage or transfer. It supports various compression methods and can also encrypt archives for security.
